title: Securing the Realm and Autonomous Adventure: DM-less D&D with Azure AI
summary: Dungeons & Dragons (D&D) has long thrived on the creativity and guidance of the Dungeon Master (DM), orchestrating adventures for players. Recent advancements in AI and large language models (LLMs) present a new opportunity: a DM-less D&D experience. This session focuses on the practical application of LLMs and SLMs to facilitate an autonomous, engaging tabletop RPG experience, allowing every player to take in the narrative.
